document_data.name: Dyer's broom
document_data.mainbody: '''Dyer's broom''' was a flowering plant found in [[Faer√ªn]], notable for its use in [[dye]]making.
document_data.Availability: Dyer's broom was not native to the [[Sword Coast]], but had to be imported from the east.
document_data.Usage: The flowers of the plant were a key ingredient in making dependable yellow dyes.
